title: Mojado
description: Chappell takes a bold new direction with this thriller, raising storytelling and knowledge of the Navajo culture to an entirely new level. When Mexico's bloodiest predator invades the Reservation it's up to Charlie Yazzie and his friends to take charge the Navajo way. Navajo can track prey, but can Charlie Yazzie catch a killer before the killer catches him? Mojado is a stand alone novel and book number four in the Navajo Nation Mystery Series.
author: R. Allen Chappell
